name: Dark Instagram using var names
description:
A simple recolor of the standard Instagram layout and design.
Removes some of suggested accounts fields.
additional_info: I try to regularly update v1.0 - Original Version v1.2 - Full rework, added known labels for personal customization v1.3 - Added Scrollbar CSS (I got annoyed with the defaults colors) v1.4 - Fixed some clashing values with popups. v1.5 - Updated layout and removed new suggestions div / centered positioning of content v1.6 - Changed class-names for suggestions v1.7 - Changed class names for suggestions again and removed obsolete code with horizontal story positioning v1.8 - Changed class names for suggestions again and baseline white text v1.9 - adapted to new var names. Finally they're human readable. Old vars retained for styling of message tab for quicker updates use the version connected her: https://userstyles.world/style/3753/dark-instagram-variable-recolor

style_setting_options.label: Scrollbar included
